posts.postText:
My steam ID: STEAM_0:1:19855048
My steam name: «DAF»the Silencer(:SSK:)
Server: Jailbreak
Reason: Apparently I was walling 
Ban length: I cant find it on the ban list, probably perma because he thought I was hacking
Banned by: I was reported by a player named "Josh"
Reason for unban: I was playing jailbreak yesterday and a player named "Josh" said he would report me because I shot through a window (with a scout) 
that surrounded the armory on the map alcatraz. He said it was "walling" and he left to go report me after having an argument with me.
there were people, one was bigmac. I cant remember any others names. I wasnt hacking, Im sure of it.
Well the bans for jail don't show up on that bans page so wehave to wait for whoever banned you.
